Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacterium:Bacillus subtilis (MIC=25 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Klebsiella pneumoniae (MIC=100 µg/ml), Shigella dysentariae (MIC=50 µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC=200 µg/ml), Eshchericia coli (MIC=25 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.12199716] 0.06% hemolytic activity at 10 µg/mL, 0.32% hemolytic activity at 100 µg/mL against human red blood cells.
Sequence Information.Comments: Single substitution of aspartic acid 16 by phenylalanine (D16F) in the Delta24-37 GGN4, which is a peptide analogue with 14 residues truncated from the C-terminus of GGN4.

Literature.Title: Effects of a tryptophanyl substitution on the structure and antimicrobial activity of C-terminally truncated gaegurin 4.
Literature.Author: Won HS, Park SH, Kim HE, Hyun B, Kim M, Lee BJ, Lee BJ.
